dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8816 IH: Providing Resources, Officers, and Technology to Eradicate Cyber Threats to Our Children Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Wasserman Schultz (for herself, Mr. Chabot, Ms. Kuster, and Mr. Reschenthaler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To reauthorize the National Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Providing Resources, Officers, and Technology to Eradicate Cyber Threats to Our Children Act of 2022 or the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2022.
Section 107(a)(10) of the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2008 (34 U.S.C. 21117(a)(10)) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2024.
